Package house.devices

Interface Device

All Superinterfaces:
HousePart, Interactable, Reportable<UsageReport>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Bicycle, Car, Computer, Cooker, ElectronicDevice, Fridge, PetFeeder, PetToy, Ski, SmartBath, SportDevice, Treadmill, TV, VacuumCleaner, WashingMachine
public interface Device extends Interactable, HousePart, Reportable<UsageReport>
Class representing device entity.
